# Project Context for LLMs

## Architecture
- /README.md: Project overview and structure

## Database
- /docs/auto/db.yaml: Auto-generated DB schema (source of truth)

## Models
- /docs/auto/models.yaml: Auto-generated ActiveRecord models and relations

## Routes
- /docs/auto/routes.yaml: Auto-generated HTTP routes for the app

## Testing
- /Makefile: Test commands
- /tests: Functional, integration, acceptance, unit tests
